About JAIN COLLEGE VASAVI CAMPUS

Jain college is one of the leading colleges in bangalore imparting quality education at the pre - university, undergraduate and post graduate levels.

Established in 1990 by Dr.Chenraj Roychand, Jain College strives to encourage a healthy and strong personality among each and every student for over the past 30 years.

The comprehensive learning curriculum is deeply reflective of a curriculum that is rigorous, relevant, contemporary and progressive. The commerce and management programs offered at Jain College, Vasavi Road have strong foundations in academic research, and are designed to tackle the very real issues faced by today’s international business community.
